history.proof: intros p0 p1 n H1 H2. induction p0 as [|a0 p00 IHp00 p01 IHp01]. - simpl. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: pl_tl_propag. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3use: pl_tl_propag.
